  • Classes in imagingbook.common.util used by imagingbook.common.color.edge 
    Class Description
    ParameterBundle
    Interface to be implemented by local 'Parameters' classes.
    ParameterBundle.DialogDigits
    Annotation to specify the number of digits displayed when showing numeric values in dialogs.
    ParameterBundle.DialogLabel
    Annotation to specify a specific 'label' to be shown for following parameter fields.
